Comment: The part I don’t understand about tariffs is that if you place tariffs on all the parts that you use to manufacture things in the US, how can you sell those things outside the US?    They simply won’t be competitive on price with goods that are manufactured in a non tariff country with parts that are far cheaper.   Because the US is not all of the market for manufactured goods, it’s only a decent fraction of it.
